transcript:

Thik hai aap kahan kahan pura bytes lead karoge na aap. Hmm hmm hmm. To man lijiye isko bhi isko bhi aap ye ha boliye. Wo wo connect kar rahe honge to aapko ye tay karna hai ki market rate pe aap competitive rate me aap do na jyada do na kam do apna taki aapka bhi sale na ho. Acha acha ji. Hmm. Aap recent wali consume karna aapko right me time bhi dikh raha hoga kitne ghante pehle aaya hai lead recent wali consume karna. Acha. Hmm hmm. Thik hai sir. Isme aap buyer consume karoge na ya fir jo bhi aapko buyer aapke profile pe aa ke requirement post karega wo yahi yahi pe aa jayega. Acha isi me aa jayega. To to sara aapke paas yahi pe aa jayega jo bhi aapke buyer profile pe aapke aage requirement bhejega to yahi aa jayega thik hai aap dekhoge kitna bhi yaha pe hai new buyer hai call received on 9210256774 likha aa raha hai thik hai aap baat bhi kar rahe ho. Thik hai sabko dikh raha hai na sara cheez dikh raha hoga aapko call call dikh raha hai. Hmm hmm. Jaise aapko isme jo hai one sided jo hai. Hmm hmm. One one sided.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer facing network issues during screen sharing.

- Wants to know about charges for leads.

- Wants to know where the consumed leads are stored.



Resolution:

- Executive helped with screen sharing.

- Executive explained how to contact buyers.

- Executive explained about lead manager option.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, screen sharing, lead manager
